      • cancelCopy

        public void cancelCopy()
                throws SQLException
        从接口复制的说明: CopyOperation
        Cancels this copy operation, discarding any exchanged data.
        指定者:
        cancelCopy 在接口中 CopyOperation
        抛出:
        SQLException - if cancelling fails

      • getFieldCount

        public int getFieldCount()
        指定者:
        getFieldCount 在接口中 CopyOperation
        返回:
        number of fields in each row for this operation

      • getFieldFormat

        public int getFieldFormat(int field)
        指定者:
        getFieldFormat 在接口中 CopyOperation
        参数:
        field - number of field (0..fieldCount()-1)
        返回:
        format of requested field: 0 = textual, 1 = binary

      • getFormat

        public int getFormat()
        指定者:
        getFormat 在接口中 CopyOperation
        返回:
        overall format of each row: 0 = textual, 1 = binary

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        指定者:
        isActive 在接口中 CopyOperation
        返回:
        is connection reserved for this Copy operation?

      • handleCopydata

        protected abstract void handleCopydata(byte[] data)
                                throws PSQLException
        Consume received copy data
        参数:
        data - data that was receive by copy protocol
        抛出:
        PSQLException - if some internal problem occurs

      • getHandledRowCount

        public long getHandledRowCount()
        从接口复制的说明: CopyOperation
        After succesful end of copy, returns the number of database records handled in that operation. Only implemented in PostgreSQL server version 8.2 and up. Otherwise, returns -1.
        指定者:
        getHandledRowCount 在接口中 CopyOperation
        返回:
        number of handled rows or -1
